# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(AcceleratorCSS LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID})

# target
add_library(AcceleratorCSS SHARED "")
set_target_properties(AcceleratorCSS PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "AcceleratorCSS")
set_target_properties(AcceleratorCSS PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
set_target_properties(AcceleratorCSS PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(AcceleratorCSS PRIVATE
    src
    protobufs/generated
    breakpad-config/linux
    vendor/breakpad/src
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/thirdparty/protobuf-3.21.8/src
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/common
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/game/shared
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/game/server
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/public
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/public/engine
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/public/mathlib
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/public/tier0
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/public/tier1
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/public/entity2
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/public/game/server
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/public/schemasystem
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/core
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/core/sourcehook
    vendor/metamod-source/core
    vendor/metamod-source/core/sourcehook
    ../../AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/f/fmt/11.2.0/ee1902dd7cff4195a287949f80dbce70/include
    ../../AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/s/spdlog/v1.15.3/f0315a3a96984a418ff57bb210e533f9/include

    ../../AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/d/distorm/2021.12.18/8b86e102275740f7ab676d9b469bd3aa/include
    ../../AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/z/zlib/v1.3.1/95786712bac941e795afa187a68143a4/include
)
target_compile_options(AcceleratorCSS PRIVATE
        $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-Wno-register>
)

if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(AcceleratorCSS PRIVATE /utf-8 /EHsc)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
    target_compile_options(AcceleratorCSS PRIVATE -fexceptions -fcxx-exceptions -finput-charset=UTF-8 -fexec-charset=UTF-8)
elseif(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
    target_compile_options(AcceleratorCSS PRIVATE -fexceptions -finput-charset=UTF-8 -fexec-charset=UTF-8)
endif()

set_target_properties(AcceleratorCSS PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(AcceleratorCSS PRIVATE cxx_std_20)

if(NOT CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(AcceleratorCSS PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()

if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET AcceleratorCSS PROPERTY
            MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDLL")
endif()

    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/lib/linux64/release/libprotobuf.a
    vendor/hl2sdk-cs2/lib/linux64/libtier0.so
